document_data.name: Potato Leek Soup
document_data.mainbody: '''Potato leek soup''' was a type of [[dwarf|dwarven]] soup in [[Faerûn]], named for its prominence of [[leek]]s and [[potato]]s. It was often served cold.

Notable Users.Regions & Settlements:
* This dish was a mainstay in [[Mithral Hall]], being served year round.
* In dwarven cuisine, [[leek bread]] was a staple often served alongside potato and leek soup and rothé back steak.{{Cite web/theedverse/2022-11-03 - Dwarven Cuisine}}
